name: sf-soql-cirra-ai
description: Advanced SOQL skill with natural language to query generation, query optimization, relationship traversal, and performance analysis. Build efficient queries with 100-point scoring validation. Powered by Cirra AI MCP Server.

mcp_tools.name: cirra_ai_init
mcp_tools.description: Initialize Cirra AI MCP Server (required before any other tools)

mcp_tools.name: soql_query
mcp_tools.description: Execute SOQL queries with structured parameters

mcp_tools.name: tooling_api_query
mcp_tools.description: Query Tooling API for metadata and performance analysis

mcp_tools.name: sobject_describe
mcp_tools.description: Get detailed metadata for Salesforce objects

mcp_tools.name: sobjects_list
mcp_tools.description: List all available objects in the org

key_changes: Queries use structured parameters instead of raw SOQL strings
Use sf_user parameter instead of --target-org flag
Results returned as structured data (JSON format by default)
Field lists, WHERE clauses, and ORDER BY passed separately
Query Plan Analysis via tooling_api_query instead of CLI flags
